attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2008-1957

Date: 2008-12-22

Sur recommandation du premier ministre, le Comité du Conseil privé recommande que des lettres patentes revêtues du grand sceau du Canada soient émises nommant l'honorable Thomas A. Cromwell, juge de la Cour d’appel de la Nouvelle-Écosse, au poste de juge de la Cour suprême du Canada.

 


The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, advises that letters patent under the Great Seal of Canada be issued appointing the Honourable Thomas A. Cromwell, a Judge of the Nova Scotia Court of Appeal, to be a Puisne Judge of the Supreme Court of Canada.

The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, advises that letters patent under the Great Seal of Canada be issued appointing the Honourable Thomas A. Cromwell, a Judge of the Nova Scotia Court of Appeal, to be a Puisne Judge of the Supreme Court of Canada.
